title: Riot, please! I need a little RP.
body:
Riot, i have 2291 RP, i bought a $50 gift card, and spent the RP on Camille, her Program skin, and Winter Wonder Karma, but i also want Snow day Syndra and Syndra, which costs 2325 total RP.

I'm 34 off!

I do love the snow skins, and i wanted to try and ask Riot for a little RP, just enough to get the skin and Syndra, I even drew a [picture](http://images6.fanpop.com/image/user_images/5683000/BanetteGhosneir-5683750_650_389.jpg) (on my fanpop page) if It'll help!

please Riot!

replies.body: FAM I WANT SNOW DAY SYNDRA ITS MINE

Your drawing is amazing, really well done!  It really gets me thinking.  Which is way too early in the morning for!  It's really cool that your friend gifted you so RP so you can get your item now.  Have fun!

It's quite allright now!

my friend has graciously given me enough RP to purchase the item i wanted, Thank you Longboii.

Have a good christmas everyone.
